postcontent: A Trapper’s best friend. Trappers in the old west worked hard, were in constant danger from hostile forces, not the least of which were the elements and nature itself. A cut-down barrel on a Model 1873 carbine gave a man compact firepower while he worked to make his fortune on the rivers of the frontier. This 1873 is made in the classic carbine style with a carbine strap butt plate and a forend with a barrel band. The 16″ barrel matches the length of the tubular magazine with holds nine rounds of 357 Magnum (or 38 Special), plus another round in the chamber for good measure. The blued steel barrel contrasts perfectly with the color case hardened receiver. Pick one up and feel how smooth the action cycles with the ultra-reliable brass lifter action. The real deal. It is hard to imagine a more beautiful representation of the Model ’73 mystique. With its steel cased colored receiver, that is tough and rugged, and its classic round barrel with traditional sights,  this rifle is as ready for serious shooting and hunting as the originals were over 140 years ago. title: For Sale:  Ruger LCRx 357 Magnum Double-Action Revolver
postcontent: When it was originally introduced, the Ruger LCR® was one of the most significant new revolver designs in over a century and has since been awarded three patents. The new LCRx in .357 Magnummaintains all the features of the original LCR, including Ruger’s patented friction-reducing cam, a next-generation design in fire control systems that results in a smooth, non-stacking trigger pull. The double-action trigger pull force on the LCR builds gradually and peaks later in the trigger stroke, resulting in better control and a lighter felt trigger pull. The LCRx also incorporates crisp single-action functionality for precise shooting. The LCRx is equipped with an integral u-notch rear sight and a pinned, white ramp front sight for quick target acquisition. The Hogue® Tamer™ Monogrip® with finger grooves provides outstanding control under recoil. The LCRx chambered in .357 Magnum has three main components: a polymer fire control housing, a stainless steel monolithic cylinder frame and an extensively fluted stainless steel cylinder.  Monolithic frame is made from 400 series stainless steel. Patented friction reducing cam is a next generation design in fire control systems that results in a smooth, non-stacking trigger pull. Patented polymer fire control housing holds all the fire control components in their proper dimensional relationships, reduces weight significantly and helps reduce recoil. High-strength stainless steel cylinder is extensively fluted (reducing weight) and features a PVD finish for excellent durability. Grip peg allows for a variety of grip styles to be installed. Replaceable, pinned ramp front sight with white bar. External hammer for single-action use. postcontent: The Bounty Hunter single action revolver has been sold in the USA for over 20 years. Made in Germany and available in 22LR / 22WMR, .357 Mag, .44 Mag and 45 LC, it is simply one of the best single action revolvers produced. You can purchase a more expensive, or a famous brand, but you won’t be getting a better single action firearm. The Bounty Hunter is a traditional 6 shot single action revolver with traditional resting notch, but it also has a transfer bar and recessed chambers for shooting safety. Our 22LR/22WMR version is on a full size frame unlike our competition. So you can practice your Cowboy Action Shooting with rimfire or go plinking with our 6rd or 8rd rimfire cylinders. title: For Sale:  Diamondback DB9 Semi Automatic Handgun 9mm Luger 2.80″ Barrel 6 Rounds Polymer Frame Matte Black DB9
postcontent: The Diamondback DB9 Semi-automatic Handgun is about as small as you can get in a compact 9mm Luger pistol. This compact pistol has a 2.8″ barrel and the magazine holds 6 rounds of ammunition. The frame is made of polymer and the firearm comes in a black finish. Designed with safety in mind, the DB9 features a “ZERO-Energy” striker firing system (patent pending) with a mechanical firing pin block, a steel magazine catch to secure a sheet metal magazine and real windage-adjustable sights, all in a lightweight pistol. A steel trigger with dual connecting bars allows for a crisp smooth, five-pound DAO trigger pull. The DB9 features a FEA (Finite Element Analysis) designed slide and barrel that is stronger than any comparable firearm, resulting in durability with less felt recoil, and the absence of removable pins or tools makes field stripping easier than ever. The slide, barrel, and internal parts are coated to resist corrosion, making this pistol a lifetime investment. title: For Sale:  EAA 999443 Witness Pavona Sapphire 13+1 380ACP
postcontent: EAA Witness Pavona .380 ACP Polymer Compact – Sapphire Blue  For the discerning shooter who appreciates Italian design and craftsmanship. The new WITNESS PAVONA POLYMER PISTOL is compact, easy to load, easy to control and enjoyable to use. From its inception in the world famous Italian Valley of the Guns, the Witness Pavona offers a lightweight, ergonomic grip in a distinct, compact, smooth, sparkling polymer frame; with integral checkering and sculptured, contoured lines. Tanfoglio kept the traditional external hammer so when the hammer is cocked with the safety engaged, before slide movement, the hammer spring is depressed thus allowing the slide to move easier during loading. Tanfoglio engineers also fine-tuned the hammer and recoil springs to allow for smoother function in addition to adding unique slide-gripping areas to enhance the overall pistol function, feel and ease of use. The WITNESS PAVONA is beautifully designed, elegantly packaged and sparkles when you hold it; a sophisticated pistol for any shooter. Features: Compact Polymer Semi-Automatic; Low Profile, White Dot, Windage Adjustable Sight; Double Action/Single Action Trigger; Enhanced Slide Serration The polymer-frame Pavona, available in .380 ACP, 9 mm Luger and .40 S&W, provides a choice of viable and popular calibers along with a 13-round capacity (nine for the .40) and broad palette of sparkling colored polymer frames, adding a little bling to the bang. Five base colors are available: Charcoal, Black, Fandango (a light purple), Imperial (a darker purple) and Sapphire (blue). Additional customization is offered through a choice of either a blued or chromed slide to go with the 3.5″ barrel. Of note, the subtle but elegant metal flake is injected into, not onto, the polymer, so there is no loss of finish after repeated use. Gone are the days of the pre-“Wonder Finish” wear points. The frame also sports integral checkering and sculptured, contoured lines. Lamentably absent is an integral Picatinny-style accessory rail, which would have been a further draw for defense-minded shooters. Still, the Pavona, like its namesake bird, is a looker. But the appeal of the Pavona is not just in its feathers. It’s also in its function.

title: For Sale:  Tanfoglio Witness Pavona Compact Black Polymer Frame With Gold Accents Blue 13+1 European American Armory 999400
postcontent: For the discerning shooter who appreciates Italian design and craftsmanship. The new WITNESS PAVONA POLYMER PISTOL is compact, easy to load, easy to control and enjoyable to use. From its inception in the world famous Italian Valley of the Guns, the Witness Pavona offers a lightweight, ergonomic grip in a distinct, compact, smooth, sparkling polymer frame; with integral checkering and sculptured, contoured lines. Tanfoglio kept the traditional external hammer so when the hammer is cocked with the safety engaged, before slide movement, the hammer spring is depressed thus allowing the slide to move easier during loading. Tanfoglio engineers also fine-tuned the hammer and recoil springs to allow for smoother function in addition to adding unique slide-gripping areas to enhance the overall pistol function, feel and ease of use. The WITNESS PAVONA is beautifully designed, elegantly packaged and sparkles when you hold it; a sophisticated pistol for any shooter.  Features: Compact Polymer Semi-Automatic; Low Profile, White Dot, Windage Adjustable Sight; Double Action/Single Action Trigger; Enhanced Slide Serrations; Reversable Mag Release; Polymer Frame; Lightened Recoil and Hammer Springs for reduced felt recoil and loading

title: For Sale:  1851 Black Powder Navy Revolver .44 Cal Brass – Blued, by Traditions – FR18511 – Black Powder
postcontent: 1851 Black Powder Navy Revolver .44 Cal Brass – Blued, by Traditions – FR18511 – Black Powder The 1851 Black Powder Navy Revolvers are beautiful, combining high quality workmanship, with modern design features and all of the mystique of the Old West. Equally at home in a display case or on the range. Even though these are nice enough to be considered works of art, they are a tremendous, tough as nails highly functional firearm and one of the finest From the manufacturer. Union Army soldiers relied on many different types of sidearms for short range and close quarters combat. The revolver was unique in that it had the ability to fire several rounds per minute before having to reload. Revolvers were typically issued to officers and mounted soldiers, however some were purchased privately or found on the battlefield by infantrymen. Distinguished by its octagon barrel and lever style loader, the 1851 helped to begin both the expansion of the West and the Civil War. The 1851 Navy is commonly considered to be one of gunfighter “Wild Bill” Hickok’s favorite handguns. The British government licensed the manufacturing rights and produced what is commonly known as the London Model. This revolver features an 7.375″ octagonal barrel, brass frame, brass guard, and walnut grip. It is available in .44 caliber, weighs 2.5 lbs., and is 13.5″ in length. These are full functioning firearms and should be handled using the same protective safety measures as any other firearm. title: For Sale:  Glock 39 Sub Compact Semi Automatic Pistol .45 GAP 6 Rounds Polymer Frame Matte Black PI3950201
postcontent: GLOCK 39 .45 GAP Semi Auto Pistol, 3.42″ Barrel 6 Rounds, Black The GLOCK G39 is a fantastic choice for plain clothes, off duty or concealed carry. With a smaller profile and 6 rounds of hard hitting .45 GAP, this sub-compact GLOCK 39 is the ideal for platform for personal defense! GLOCK has a well established world famous reputation for being utterly reliable, durable, and accurate. It’s no wonder why more law enforcement, military, and lawful citizens rely on GLOCK to protect themselves and their loved ones then any other pistol. Get yourself a GLOCK G39 today and experience for yourself why they call it “GLOCK Perfection” The Glock 39 is a semi-automatic small-frame pistol chambered in .45 GAP. The G39’s cartridge, .45 GAP, is a shorter version of .45 ACP and offers comparable stopping power. However, the cartridge was specifically designed for compact pistols like the G39. The G39 has standard Glock features such as a polymer grip that’s lightweight making it 1.6 pounds loaded. On the front of the grip are finger grooves and the sides have a rough texture that feels a bit like sandpaper. Its double-action trigger is also “safe-action” meaning the safety is on the trigger rather than the side. The only way a round can fire is if the shooter pulls the trigger because its internal design won’t allow the firing pin to punch forward any other way. This prevents accidental discharges if the pistol is dropped. title: For Sale:  Sig Sauer p238 (w/extras)
postcontent: For Sale is a LNIB Sig Sauer p238 Nitro equipt with nightsights, including available after market accessories such as 2 extra extended mags and comfortable Houge Rubbber Grips, and a box of 20 Speer Gold Dot hollow point self defence ammo. The costs of which, when included with the purchase price of the Sig Sauer p238 alone, is significantly lower than my current asking price. Keep that in mind. Asking for $599 or best offer. Looking for cash but if you have something interesting to trade I'll consider it. CZ-USA, FN, Sig Sauer handguns in 9mm and SKS rifles are of particular interest.                                                      After a mere 175 rounds exculsively of Sig Sauer brand Performance ammunition fired I've from it since I purchaced the firearm about 7 months ago. This p238 is as close to out of the box condition as one could hope for. It's small size and light weight make it a perfect conceal carry weapon, easily concealable even during the summer months. While the p238 sturdy alloy frame and high quality feel, unlike more flimsy pocket 380's on the market, gives you the peace of mind that should you ever find yourself in a situation where you must defend yourself or your family, it will reliably function and fire flawlessly to neutralize the threat. You and your loved ones safety is something never to skimp on.   As a first time Sig owner, I can't say enough about this gun. Even being only a moderately experenced shooter myself I found that the accruarcy from 15 yrds all the way out to 25 yards I achiched was incredible and futher evidence of Sig's well earned reputation for excellence. At the range with my buddy, he and I did a side by side comparision of his Glock 42 and my p238. While both being fantastic firearms, we both prefered the softer recoil of the alloy framed p238 and the accuracy that it provides. I would not think to part with this firearm at all but I must in order to raise funds for unexpected car repair costs.       Offer includes:Model: Sig Sauer p238# of mags 3:  1 6+1 flush mag that come in box with origional purchase 2 Sig Sauer brand 7+1  extended mags purchased (arfter market) Caliber: 380 ACPBarrel:2.7 inchesOverall Length: 5.5 inchesSights: SIGLITE Night Sights Frame: Alloy FrameType: Semi AutoAction: Single ActionFinish: NitronStock/Grips: Houge Rubber Finger GrooveGun Case: Lockable Sig Hard Case/ a Drago Gear soft case for easy accessable storage everywhere from your the glove compartment to your range bag. postcontent: ****To see other gun, refer to globalgunsales.com ****This fine Colt, sn41786 made in 1856, came to us as part of a two-gun set in a fine walnut case. The second gun is an equally fine Colt 1851 Old Model Navy. The guns will be sold separately or together to facilitate a speedy sale. The case will be part of the sale of either gun or will go with the pair if sold together to the same party. This London addressed gun is in superb factory original condition with all matching parts. The 7 ½”, .36 caliber barrel retain 96% factory blue that is the rich, dark blue you hope to find on such a revolver. The bore is bright and shiny with a few scattered patches of minor pitting. The cylinder retains all the sharp, clear engraving, 85% factory blue, and clean London proof marks. The frame, rammer, and hammer all retain 98% vivid factory case color. The mechanics are crisp with strong springs, solid cylinder lock up, and all pins remaining as new on the cylinder. The original factory walnut grips have no cracks or repairs and most all of the original varnish remaining. This is an incredible find and a remarkable Colt 1851 with the desirable London address. The grip straps are the proper London blue with only a small amount of blue loss on the front of the grip strap and hard edges. The screws are only slightly marred and in very good condition. The condition of this gun is collector quality and rarely seen on a Colt that has had 161 birthdays. A true investment quality Colt revolver. If you are able to buy both and keep them in the more modern made French fit box you would have a most impressive pair of Colt 1851 Navy pistols, one from each of the period manufacturer’s address’ and both in superb factory original condition. Thanks for looking and don’t let this Colt get away! Better yet, buy them both! Thanks for looking.Action;Action: tight, as newCase Color: 98% factoryEngraving: cylinder scene clear and sharpTrigger Type: crispTrigger Guard Color: 85%

title: For Sale:   Weldon Lister Engraved Pair of Colt Commander's, Cal. .45 ACP, Commander
location: South Dakota, South Dakota, United States
postcontent: ****To see other guns, refers go to globalgunsales.com ****Exhibiting some of the finest balance, layout and execution of contemporary engraving we have seen, this pair of standard weight .45 Colt Commander's were embellished by FEGE Master Engraver, Weldon Lister of Boerne, Texas. The near 100% coverage required 300 hours each over a period of six months. The mixture of foliate, germanic scrolls and geometric designs are so well integrated, and flow so well, that one feels he sees somethiong new each time he views the guns. They are deeply cut and shaded to give depth, and are true works of art. The guns are not consecutive in serial number, but were both manufactured in 2013, and have matching pre-ban checkered Ivory grips. These are two of the most attractive engraved 1911 Commanders I have ever seen.Price: $27,500 for the Pair

title: For Sale:  Sig 716 (.308 PISTOL!!!)
location: Northside San Antonio, San Antonio, Texas
postcontent: So... let’s going ahead and get this out of the way. Yes... you read right. This IS a .308 PISTOL. From the Sig Sauer factory in 2014 as a pistol. NOT converted from a rifle IN TO a pistol, which is illegal to do in the first place. This is VERY RARE. You can’t find these  ANYWHERE. And if you end up stumbling across one, it sure as heck isn’t NIB. These were a short production run and they didn’t make very many. Only produced for a year or 2. This one is from 2014. This is the exact same thing as the iconic battleproven Sig 716 piston operated .308 battle rifle. One of the most popular and widely used AR10 platforms in the world. It’s just a 12” version. So much firepower in a very small and compact package. The recoil isn’t as bad as you would think and I’ve taken it out to 300 yards with complete accuracy (the furthest I have access to). It is loud though, haha! All of the parts are identical to the standard 716. Same barrel specs, same controls. Only differences are the barrel length and the brace.These went for $2,150... period... the end. That was the price no matter where you got them online. More if you got them at a physical storefront. The actual model is Sig P716 12” (P means “pistol”) uses a short-stroke piston with a fully adjustable gas block for custom loads and suppressed shooting.Comes with (2) 20-round mags Also comes with one of the BEST triggers on the market. The Timney Skeletonized fully adjustable match trigger. They normally go for $270 (adjustable pin tension settings for no rattle or “pin-walk”, adjustable weight and length of pull). $2,420 setup, my price is $2,200 FIRM. You can absolutely go and try to find another; be my guest. If you really don’t want the Timney I will put the milspec Trigger in it. This is in like new condition. Less than 250 rounds through it. No optics included , can include a little bit of ammo for the right deal. NO TRADES! Cash only! If you want serious firepower in a small package with world class reliability, then THIS is the firearm FOR YOU! Please message me for more info!

title: For Sale:  CZ 52 Grey Ghost W/Holster
postcontent: Hello, Known as the VZ52 or the CZ52 pistol. The CZ 52 pistol is a roller-locked short recoil–operated, detachable box magazine–fed, single-action, semi-automatic pistol chambered for the 7.62×25mm Tokarev cartridge. This pistol has original holster and two mags. Ammo is easily available and a very potent necked cartridge with 1640 FPS muzzel velocity. The CZ 52's operating controls consist of a single-action trigger, an external hammer, a magazine catch located at the heel of the grip frame, and a combination de-cock/safety lever located on the left rear side of the receiver aft of the left grip panel. The manual safety blocks movement of the sear, which prevents the hammer from releasing and firing a round. A second safety, in the form of a spring-loaded firing pin block, prevents the pistol from firing unless the trigger is pulled fully to the rear; this feature renders the pistol "drop safe". Military Parkerized Finish with grooved miltary plastic grips. This Caliber is hughly more powerful than the 9mm Luger cartridge.MN buyer needs MN state ID and permit. Out of MN residents pay $30 shipping to local FFL for transfer.
